## Getting help

*If you need help with LANDFIRE data, contact helpdesk@landfire.gov.
If you need help with Syncrosim software, try posting a question on the [SyncroSim forum](https://syncrosim.com/forums/).

*[LANDFIRE BpS model download](http://www.landfirereview.org/search.php)

*[LANDFIRE homepage](https://www.landfire.gov/)

*[LANDFIRE Guides and Tutorials](https://www.conservationgateway.org/ConservationPractices/FireLandscapes/LANDFIRE/Library/Pages/library.aspx)

*[ApexRMS](https://www.conservationgateway.org/ConservationPractices/FireLandscapes/LANDFIRE/Library/Pages/library.aspx) (website for SyncroSim software)

*[SyncroSim documentation](http://docs.syncrosim.com/)

*[SyncroSim publications](http://docs.stsim.net/publications.html)
